item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Maybe just try making a mask and lowering the opacity of that small area?
Or even making a new rain animation, but with much less noise, frequency, or whatever it is that gave you that effect; and applying that to your mask.

Read full topic

item.title: My first 5 photoshop pics. (Just added 3rd, 4th, and 5th.)
item.dc:creator: @pookey71 Pookey71
item.description:
@pookey71 wrote:

.Kaboom:

Don’t use animation if it isn’t necessary, it makes you look unprofessional

LMFAO! Quote of the fucking month, most really good looking sigs have some animation.
http://www.templatemonster.com/ <- Tell me which ones would never use animation.That site is the best for Professional template,they also use animation.

That sig is really noob aye(I know about text, I just pulled from a site selling them :P)
Also Tr3v0r,very good job on the rain one :D! Don’t mind the .Kaboom dick, he doesn’t know shit.

Read full topic

item.title: My first 5 photoshop pics. (Just added 3rd, 4th, and 5th.)
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

I like the firsy one, though that doesn’t matter since I’m nothing of a graphics expert.

The second one would be better if the changed color as it moved, like that dark red on the right and the dark green and the left.

Add an effect for the shield on the 3rd one, then it would look good.

I would have to agree with exe626 on the last one

Read full topic
item.source: My first 5 photoshop pics. (Just added 3rd, 4th, and 5th.)

item.title: My first 5 photoshop pics. (Just added 3rd, 4th, and 5th.)
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Of the first 2, Exe says nay. The animated text is just something that doesn’t fit. If some of the rain on the 3rd one was removed, put at a better angle - and flowed with his shield, it would look better, exclaimed exe.
The last one is a slight improvement, but don’t use a lens flair and don’t just slap a render into what ever that is.

Read full topic
